name: Star vs. the Game
description:
Star vs. the Game is a cross between top-down beat-em up action and 2D platforming. Play as both Star and Marco and fight against a threat from beyond reality!

The game features 7 levels with four bosses, as well as some extra content once the game is beaten. 

You definitely do NOT need to watch the show to play this! 

This game is also in no way official or endorsed by Disney.
